1.「また 会いましたね <cs_pchero>さん。| バトリンピック・予選のチェ: I've seen you again<cs_pchero>This is the first time I've done this. Here|are the checkpoints for the Battling Olympics|and Qualifiers...

5.「まあ それも 予選を突破すればの話……: Well, that's if we make it past the qualifying round

9.「今度こそ 逃がしませんよ。| 我が主のために 死んでもらいます！: I'm not letting you go this time... You will|die for my lord!

10.「どうやら 手助けの必要は なかったようだな。: Apparently, he didn't need any help...

11.「ああ。こいつ 逃げようとしてたんで| ちょいとばかし なでといたぜ。: Oh. He was trying to escape, so I gave him a|little pat...

12.「しかし アンタが 参加してるのを狙って| こいつが 係員をやってたんなら| こ: But if this guy was working as an attendant|just to get you to participate, then this|tournament doesn't seem legit...

13.「さて それじゃ オレは失礼する！| ……この男のことは まかせてもらうぜ。|: Now, if you'll excuse me, I have to go.|I'll... I'll leave you to it. I've got him.

I'm sure you have questions you'd like to ask|me, too, but if you'll let me do my job|first... Don't forget this. And don't forget|
|about this guy!
